name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Tabs By Title or URL

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find your wished tab in the current window, by a title or URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension gives the option to search between all the open tabs in the current window.

The search is by the tab's title and its URL. In addition, it gives the current amount of the open tabs or the search results number.

Click on the search result item to go directly to the wished tab.

The icons (all sizes) are from -  https://icons8.com - Icon pack by Icons8
